product_name: Kingston A2000 1TB NVMe M.2 Internal SSD
description: The Kingston A2000 1TB NVMe SSD is a high-speed storage solution with PCIe NVMe support. With a 1TB capacity, it's perfect for gaming and productivity. It offers read speeds of up to 2200 MB/s and write speeds of up to 2000 MB/s. The M.2 2280 form factor ensures compatibility with modern systems.

product_name: Kingston UV500 480GB 2.5" SATA III Internal SSD
description: The Kingston UV500 480GB SSD is an efficient storage upgrade for your PC or laptop. With SATA III support, it offers a capacity of 480GB. It delivers read speeds of up to 520 MB/s and write speeds of up to 500 MB/s. The 2.5-inch form factor makes it suitable for a wide range of devices.

product_name: Kingston KC600 256GB 2.5" SATA III Internal SSD
description: The Kingston KC600 256GB SSD is a reliable storage solution with SATA III connectivity. It provides 256GB of storage capacity. It delivers impressive read speeds of up to 550 MB/s and write speeds of up to 520 MB/s. The 2.5-inch form factor ensures compatibility with various devices.
